content.question: The unemployment rate measures the percentage of

choices.label: people in the labor force who do not have jobs
people in the labor force who have a part-time job but are looking for a full-time job
people who do not have jobs and have given up looking for work
people in the adult population who do not have jobs
people in the adult population who have temporary jobs

content.answer: people in the labor force who do not have jobs

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
